name: Umair Khan Durrani
headline: Business Intelligence Analyst | Data Visualization | Power BI Developer
Business Developer | Client Acquisition Strategist | Growth Engineer
HR & Admin Operations | Public Sector Coordination
summary: Data-driven professional skilled in Power BI, SQL, Excel, and data modeling, with proven experience in business analysis, client acquisition, CRM management, and public sector documentation. Adept at building dashboards, automating analytics workflows, and aligning tech capabilities with business goals. Known for cross-functional collaboration, process optimization, and producing actionable insights for decision-making.

experience.title: Sales BI Analyst / Growth Engineer
description: Engineered dynamic Power BI dashboards for sales pipeline visibility, executive insights, and bidding optimization.
Built reusable data models from CRM exports, reducing report turnaround time.
Delivered weekly insights to sales and marketing teams to inform strategy and resource allocation.
Achieved initial revenue target and managed full-cycle bidding on Upwork.

experience.title: Sales Intelligence Specialist / Business Developer
description: Generated 360+ warm leads in 6 months across Upwork, LinkedIn, Fiverr, and Freelancer.
Automated lead scoring system using Power BI to identify high-conversion opportunities.
Designed real-time dashboards tracking outreach performance and competitor benchmarks.
Created Power BI dashboards for lead tracking and competitor monitoring.
Managed web/app project delivery and created cost/time breakdowns.

experience.title: Business Analyst / Business Developer
description: Conducted exploratory data analysis and visualized sales and competitor data for UK market entry.
Integrated CRM and third-party research sources into centralized analytics reporting.
Spearheaded delivery of software products including trucking systems and lender apps.
Built and managed CRM databases to boost lead tracking and conversions.

experience.title: Assistant Director (Coordination & Documentation)
description: Drafted summaries, memos, and internal case files to expedite administrative decisions.
Maintained HRIS and digitized employee/project records to reduce redundancies.
Coordinated department calendars, procurement, and inter-department updates.
Facilitated recruitment lifecycle and maintained compliance with government proposal deadlines.

experience.title: Digital Marketing Assistant / Executive
description: Analyzed social media engagement and guided content strategy across multiple channels.
Produced weekly engagement reports to inform campaign adjustments.
Handled outreach and operational communication for public health awareness projects.
Managed digital customer support and maintained fast response standards.

projects.name: Real-Time Real Estate Dashboard
projects.description: Built an end-to-end BI solution visualizing agent KPIs, deal conversion rates, and regional performance using slicers, calculated columns, and dynamic DAX measures.

projects.name: HR Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Designed an interactive workforce dashboard covering demographics, attrition, and satisfaction trends. Enabled HR to identify flight risk segments and policy gaps.

projects.name: Netflix Streaming Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed 78K+ streaming titles with Power Query and DAX. Created genre trend visuals, popularity heatmaps, and language segmentation for viewer insights.

projects.name: Divorce Trends Visualization
projects.description: Built a longitudinal dashboard visualizing 18 years of divorce data by state, age, education, and income. Used bookmarks and tooltips for user-friendly navigation.

projects.name: Compensation & Retention Study
projects.description: Led a cross-sectional study correlating pay practices with employee loyalty. Produced executive slides backed by survey data and pivot-based analytics.

projects.name: E-Commerce Sales Tracker
projects.description: Developed a dynamic dashboard monitoring product sales, category performance, and conversion funnels. Applied row-level security and dynamic filtering.

projects.name: Call Center Performance Insights
projects.description: Built visual reports analyzing agent efficiency, customer wait times, and resolution rates using slicers and KPI cards. Enabled call center leads to improve SLA adherence.

projects.name: Healthcare Utilization Dashboard
projects.description: Analyzed hospital admission data by specialty, patient demographics, and region. Created drill-through views for treatment trends and resource planning.

certifications: Business Intelligence Course – AI Data Yard (2025)
Data Modelling in Power BI – Microsoft (2024)
